traits.name: Light Absorption
entries: If the light devourer spends any part of its turn in an area of bright light or is subjected to radiant damage, it radiates dim light in a 10-foot radius for 1 hour.

traits.name: Water Breathing
entries: The light devourer can breathe only underwater.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The light devourer makes two Bite attacks.

actions.name: Bite
entries: Melee atk +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 21 (5d6 + 4 damage) piercing damage, or radiant damage if the light devourer is radiating light (see Light Absorption).
